caption.title: Linear charge calibration curve for dopamine, adenosine, and dopamine +adenosine using a)True integration limits b) curvature integration limits, and c) inflection integration limits at concentrations of 0.1 μM, 0.5 μM, and 1 μM.
caption.p: Data are fit with a linear regression and R 2 values are displayed for each analyte.
